content.question: As a measure of economic performance, <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> accounts for which of the following?

choices.label: Used books donated to a local library
Souvenir gifts purchased by tourists domestically
Cash transactions in the underground economy

content.answer: Souvenir gifts purchased by tourists domestically

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
